title: Rebrand frontend to QUICK-D and swap to combined logo

requirements.summary: Rename the app brand from "Quick-Delvery" to "QUICK-D" across all user-facing frontend text (titles, headings, marketing copy, and footer).
acceptanceCriteria: Auth page displays "Welcome to QUICK-D" (or equivalent) and does not mention "Quick-Delvery".
Home header brand text and footer copyright display "QUICK-D".
Out-of-radius page message uses "QUICK-D" instead of "Quick-Delvery".
A project-wide search in frontend code finds no remaining user-facing occurrences of the old brand name "Quick-Delvery" (excluding historical filenames if any).

file_operations.description: Update the HTML <title> from "Quick-Delvery" to "QUICK-D" to ensure the browser tab title matches the new brand.
Replace user-facing brand text from "Quick-Delvery" to "QUICK-D" in the splash screen title/marketing copy.
Update the auth page heading/marketing copy to consistently use "QUICK-D" and remove any mention of "Quick-Delvery".
Update the home header brand text and footer copyright to display "QUICK-D" instead of "Quick-Delvery".
Update out-of-radius messaging text to use "QUICK-D" instead of "Quick-Delvery".

requirements.summary: Replace all UI logo usages of the old generated logo with the new combined QUICK-D logo and update alt text to "QUICK-D".
acceptanceCriteria: Splash, Auth, and Home header logo images render the new combined QUICK-D logo asset (not the old quick-delvery logo).
Logo image alt text is updated to "QUICK-D" where applicable.
No broken image links occur after the logo swap (all updated paths resolve).

file_operations.description: Swap the logo image src from "/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png" to "/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png" and update the img alt text to "QUICK-D".
Swap the logo image src from "/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png" to "/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png" and update the img alt text to "QUICK-D".
Swap the header logo image src from "/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png" to "/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png" and update the img alt text to "QUICK-D".

Update any fallback usage of the old logo asset path (currently referencing "/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png") to use "/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png" so no UI still renders the old logo.

Update any fallback usage of the old logo asset path (currently referencing "/assets/generated/quick-delvery-logo.dim_512x512.png") to use "/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png" so no UI still renders the old logo.

requirements.summary: Add the new combined QUICK-D logo image file under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure the frontend loads it as a static asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: The new logo image exists at frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in the image requirements.
The app loads the logo via a direct static path under /assets/generated/ without any backend calls.

file_operations.description: Add the generated image asset file "frontend/public/assets/generated/quick-d-combined-logo.dim_512x512.png" (transparent background) and ensure it is referenced directly via the static assets path by the UI.
